step1.title: What Science Contact Hub Is
step1.description: Science Contact Hub (SCH) is an independent online platform that facilitates initial contact between individual researchers and project owners who are seeking research collaboration. SCH does not conduct research, manage projects or participate in scientific outputs.

step2.title: What the Platform Does
step2.description: It serves as a neutral intermediary, facilitating the initial connection between researchers and project owners based on their stated interests and expertise. The platform aims to increase the visibility of collaboration opportunities and individual researcher profiles.

step3.title: What the Platform Does Not Do
step3.description: It does not perform research, manage projects, validate credentials, provide funding, or engage in any contractual or financial arrangements. The platform is strictly for facilitating initial contact and increasing visibility.

step4.title: No Guarantees or Liability
step4.description: SCH does not guarantee the authenticity, quality, originality or ethical compliance of any research conducted through connections made on the platform. All responsibility for research conduct and outcomes rests entirely with the collaborating parties.

benefits.description: By lowering barriers to discovery and contact, the platform seeks to promote international collaboration, knowledge exchange and broader visibility for individual researchers across disciplines.

about.title: About the Platform
about.a1: Science Contact Hub (SCH) is an independent online platform that facilitates initial contact between individual researchers and project owners who are seeking research collaboration. SCH does not conduct research, manage projects or participate in scientific outputs. Our role is limited to enabling connections and improving visibility.
about.a2: It serves as a neutral intermediary, facilitating the initial connection between researchers and project owners based on their stated interests and expertise. The platform aims to increase the visibility of collaboration opportunities and individual researcher profiles, helping researchers expand their international networks and gain exposure.
about.q3: What does the platform NOT do?
about.a3: It does not perform research, manage projects, validate credentials, provide funding, or engage in any contractual or financial arrangements. The platform is strictly for facilitating initial contact and increasing visibility. All collaborations, responsibilities and research outputs remain entirely under the control of the participating researchers and project owners.

responsibility.title: Responsibilities & Liability
responsibility.q1: Does SCH guarantee research quality or outcomes?
responsibility.a1: No. SCH does not guarantee research quality, authenticity, ethical compliance or successful outcomes. All responsibility for research conduct and outcomes rests entirely with the collaborating parties. We serve only as an initial connection point.
responsibility.q2: Is SCH responsible for research conduct?
responsibility.a2: No. SCH bears no responsibility for research design, execution, analysis, authorship or dissemination. Researchers and project owners are fully responsible for ensuring their work meets all ethical, legal, and professional standards applicable to their fields.
responsibility.q3: Who is responsible for verifying credentials?
responsibility.a3: Project owners are solely responsible for conducting their own assessment, selection and due diligence when engaging with researchers. SCH does not verify researcher credentials, affiliations or prior outputs. We recommend thorough vetting before entering into any collaboration.

financial.title: Financial & Commercial
financial.q1: Does SCH receive payment or charge fees?
financial.a1: No. SCH does not receive fees or commissions and does not participate in financial or contractual arrangements between researchers and project owners. The platform is free to use for both researchers and project owners.
financial.q2: Is SCH affiliated with any commercial interests?
financial.a2: Our platform prioritizes research integrity and maintains complete independence from commercial interests. We do not accept advertising, sponsorship, or any form of commercial influence that could compromise our neutrality.

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.q1: What is SCH's role in collaborations?
collaborations.a1: SCH's role is limited to facilitating initial contact. All further interaction occurs directly between researchers and project owners. Once an introduction is made, we step back and let the parties develop their collaboration independently.
collaborations.q2: Does submitting a profile guarantee collaboration?
collaborations.a2: No. Submission of a profile does not imply endorsement, acceptance or guaranteed collaboration. Introductions depend on the relevance of expertise to project needs and are at the discretion of the platform and project owners.
collaborations.q3: How are researchers and projects matched?
collaborations.a3: The platform focuses on matching capabilities rather than institutions. We consider stated research interests, areas of expertise, and alignment with project goals. This approach helps lower barriers to discovery and promotes international collaboration.
